burn(address,address,uint256).details: if no position has been deployed at the provided address, it is expected to revert

params._amount: amount of position tokens to be minted to the _positionHolder
params._positionAddress: address of the position token to be burnt
params._positionOwner: address of the owner of the specified position token

params._amount: amount of position tokens to be minted to the _positionHolder
params._longPositionAddress: address of the deployed LONG position token
params._positionOwner: address of the owner of the LONG/SHORT position tokens
params._shortPositionAddress: address of the deployed SHORT position token

create(address,address,uint256,bytes32,(.details: if either of the LONG or SHORT position contracts already exists then it is expected to fail

params._amount: amount of position tokens to be minted to the _positionHolder
params._buyer: address of the recipient of the LONG position tokens
params._seller: address of the recipient of the SHORT position tokens

returns._0: _opiumPositionTokenParams OpiumPositionTokenParams struct which contains `LibDerivative.Derivative` schema of the derivative, the ` LibDerivative.PositionType` of the present ERC20 token and the bytes32 hash `derivativeHash` of the `LibDerivative.Derivative` derivative

initialize(address).details: It sets the the address of the implementation of the OpiumPositionToken contract which will be used for the factory-deployment of erc20 positions via the minimal proxy contract

mintPair(address,address,address,address.details: if LONG or SHORT position contracts have not been deployed yet at the provided addresses then it is expected to fail

params._amount: amount of position tokens to be minted to the _positionHolder
params._buyer: address of the recipient of the LONG position tokens
params._longPositionAddress: address of the deployed LONG position token
params._seller: address of the recipient of the SHORT position tokens
params._shortPositionAddress: address of the deployed SHORT position token

devdoc.title: Opium.OpiumProxyFactory contract manages the deployment of ERC20 LONG/SHORT positions for a given `LibDerivative.Derivative` structure and it's responsible for minting and burning positions according to the parameters supplied by `Opium.Core`

burn(address,address,uint256).notice: it burns specified amount of a specific position tokens on behalf of a specified ownerit is consumed by Opium.Core to execute or cancel a specific position type

burnPair(address,address,address,uint256.notice: It burns the specified amount of LONG/SHORT position tokens on behalf of a specified ownerIt is consumed by Opium.Core to redeem market neutral position pairs

create(address,address,uint256,bytes32,(.notice: It creates a specified amount of LONG/SHORT position tokens on behalf of the buyer(LONG) and seller(SHORT) - the specified amount can be 0 in which case the ERC20 contract of the position tokens will only be deployed

getImplementationAddress().notice: It retrieves the information about the underlying derivative

initialize(address).notice: It is called only once upon deployment of the contract

mintPair(address,address,address,address.notice: it creates a specified amount of LONG/SHORT position tokens on behalf of the buyer(LONG) and seller(SHORT) - the specified amount can be 0 in which case the ERC20 contract of the position tokens will only be deployed
